title: Midnight Never Ends
description: Four twisted tales of horror from author, Thomas Amo, that pay tribute to master writer of the macabre, Rod Serling, and the gothic, little salon, where sinister artwork tell the stories, in a place known as, the Night Gallery. You're invited to join us as we display four new original canvases for you to observe and study, each with its own dark story to tell. We only ask that you do not touch the exhibited works. For very frequently, they touch back. RATED 18+ FOR ADULT HORROR.
author: Thomas Amo
